title: 084 - Bus Stench, King Kong, and Sauna Guy
description:
This week, the bus stinks. Tim is struggling to stay awake during movies. Caleb thinks the squatty potty is a game changer. Freight is King Kong with a plethora of nans, and everybody thinks he should give a hotel comfort masterclass. Finally, the crew wants to get dressed up to see Luke Bryan at Busch Stadium.
  
 Follow us on Twitter!
 @poddybreak
